A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi was visually very beautiful\, exciting and entertaining. It does\, however\, destroy Luke Skywalker as a character\, de-mystifies The Force and lacks even basic storytelling finesse. Rey is an uninteresting character because she works for nothing. There is no struggle or growth. The First Order is comically buffoonish. It's a complete waste of some of the best visuals I have ever seen on film. Tragic.
